parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The remarks of the network domain. The remarks can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a network domain.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainName
parameters.description: The name of the network domain that you want to create. The name can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainType
parameters.description:
The connection mode of the network domain to be created. Valid values:

*   Direct
*   Proxy

parameters.name: Proxies
parameters.description: The information about the proxy servers.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host for which you want to create a network domain.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
